You guys must just be terrible..

I completed this game in 1hr-1hr 30 and it wasn't difficult at all. The bosses are complete and utter failures who just stand there while you shoot them..

Try pressing E to roll if you don't already know, it's the only way to survive. Other than that great game, albeit short and in my opinion to easy.

Oh and no I don't play alot of zombie shooters. Mostly rpgs so I'm not particularly good at the genre either.

Maybe its just me, but I ran into some corrupt files while extracting and attempting to launch the .exe, I've done a manual hash check and tried compatibility mode, but to no avail. I'm not doubting this share because I trust extremezone 110% , I've gotten many shares from you and every last one has been excellent, virus free and installed quickly. not to mention ALWAYS work 100%. I'm deleting the task and redownloading now, hopefully this will help. I'm using win7ultimate64x with 4gb ddr2, plenty disk space and full admin privs. This game runs great on integrated hardware for the folks who are without a decent gfx unit.
